title: Slack Is Down for Some Users; Messaging company says it is investigating an issue where the platform isn't loading properly
text:
"Our teams are aware of and are investigating the issue," a Slack spokesman said.

There were more than 10,000 reports of Slack outages at around 9:30 a.m. ET, according to Downdetector, which tracks website outages.

Temporary interruptions for popular social-media sites and messaging platforms are relatively common. Some of the outages have been felt more widespread as many employees turn to cloud services and other connected platforms to help them work remotely during the pandemic.

Salesforce.com Inc. said in late 2020 that it agreed to purchase Slack in a $27.7 billion deal. The deal closed in July 2021.

Write to Omar Abdel-Baqui at omar.abdel-baqui@wsj.com

Slack Is Down for Some Users
